name: Kivo Health
headline: Telehealth lung rehab
description: Kivo Health provides telehealth rehab for chronic lung disease patients. We offer an 8-week clinical program led by a live therapist, which saves payers $6,000 per patient. Only 3% of eligible patients are getting this life-changing therapy right now.

founders.name: Victor Sadauskas, Founder
founders.description: I'm currently working on Kivo Health - telehealth rehab for chronic lung disease. I trained as an Emergency Medicine doctor at Stanford and have seen firsthand how poor access to care can lead to higher acuity illness over time. I'm passionate about developing tech-enabled solutions that help people stay healthier while reducing healthcare costs.

founders.name: Vaughn Koch, Founder
founders.description:
I'm building Kivo Health: we provide telehealth lung rehab for COPD patients.

I'm a serial founder and technologist. I founded Movity in W2010 which exited to Trulia, and have built key tech at both startups and larger companies.

# Breathe easier and live better with Kivo Health.
Are COPD symptoms affecting your daily life?
[Call today: (707) 512-9401](https://kivohealth.com/<tel:+17075129401>)
Email us: hello@kivohealth.com
Fax: [(866) 767-5649](https://kivohealth.com/<tel:8667675649>)
[See Full Video](https://kivohealth.com/<https:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=JoWIuiKSFIg>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/65238dee5af87f0a7c231a28_quote-icon.png)
this is life changing…I only wish I could have done this earlier
– 75 year old patient
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/6523901b3505e25d76ff3455_arrow-up-white.svg)
45%
increase in activity level
![Happy older couple using a tablet device](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/65238c050c866313253391c2_happy-older-tablet.png)
## Breath recovery from the comfort of your home!
Kivo Health's 9-week pulmonary rehabilitation program can help you with:
  * ![icon of person walking](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c70dd2a0f3f043a811c91f_walking.png)
### Walking
  * ![icon of shower spraying water](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c70e24dd1c02d4fb4eaacc_showering.png)
### Showering
  * ![icon of a pan cooking food](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c70e246987c53599e4dc77_cooking.png)
### Cooking
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62d8d432cc3fe40cb8f87018_hobbies.png)
### Hobbies
  * ![icon of a person celebrating](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c70e24e200e977c89b04cd_confidence.png)
### More confidence
  * ![icon of clipboard](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c70e240ef85e5618ab2e73_symptons.png)
### Fewer symptoms


We will guide you through breathing techniques and exercises you do from the comfort of your own home, while talking with you about how to manage your lung condition.
## "I'm less short of breath, have more energy, and can do more around the house!"
_51 year old patient_
## "It really helped that I could do this program virtually. The (in-person) center wasn't close to my house - it was an hour away. It would have been a big transportation issue."
_78 year old patient_
## "I would be very disappointed if I couldn't use this remote program."
_90 year old patient_
[ I’m aPatient![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62ec9a9252527c543007704d_arrow-right-o.png)](https://kivohealth.com/</patients>)[I’m aClinician![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62ec9a9252527c543007704d_arrow-right-o.png)](https://kivohealth.com/</clinicians>)
![Woman sitting peacefully and relaxed](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62d8df056a9b1701e453c294_about-recovery.webp)
## What is breath recovery?
Breath recovery - or pulmonary rehabilitation - is a program that helps people with COPD by improving symptoms like shortness of breath and fatigue, and by decreasing flare ups. It has been around for over 60 years with tens of thousands of people all over the world having completed it with great results!
**As part of this 9-week program, you will meet with our knowledgeable respiratory therapist twice a week over video to:**
  * Learn how to manage your COPD and stay healthy
  * Practice breathing techniques
  * Complete exercises tailored to your needs


## How it works
1
### Receive Kivo Kit in the mail
We will mail you our Kivo Kit which includes all the equipment you need to complete the program at home.
2
### Set up
Our friendly staff will call to guide you through the simple set-up process and answer questions before you start. We will always be available over the phone to help with any equipment issues.
3
### Join and breathe easier
Live video sessions from your home led by our respiratory therapists. Sessions will focus on breathing methods and exercises tailored to your needs. You will feel supported by your new community and the caring team at Kivo Health.
![iPad device showing the Kivo Health app](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/64a649c2b6354a34717c63c1_kivo-kit-display-simplified.png)
## Covered by insurance
Kivo Health is covered by Medicare and most insurance plans. Depending on your insurance coverage, you may need prior authorization or have a co-pay.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c70a97e299b229e6f118bc_info.svg)
If the co-pay is preventing you from joining, talk to us. We may be able to find a payment plan that works for you.
## Results that matter
People who complete Kivo's program achieve:
Functional Capacity
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c71850dd1c0210684f0c4f_arrow-up.svg)
42
%
1 min sit to stand. 80% met MCID
Quality of Life
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c71850dd1c0210684f0c4f_arrow-up.svg)
19
%
CAT score. 64% met MCID
Dyspnea
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c71808c9c3368f7853483d_arrow-down.svg)
17
%
mMRC. 39% met MCID
Mood
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62c50d36253c368e3568b584/62c71850dd1c0210684f0c4f_arrow-up.svg)
25
%
improvement in mood PHQ-9
## What is Kivo Health?
Kivo Health is a telehealth lung care company. Our core service is an 9-week pulmonary rehab program, delivered by therapists over live video.Pulmonary rehab helps patients breathe better and live longer. It can reduce hospital bed-days by 62% and save payers nearly $6,000 per patient. Patients are thrilled to return to everyday pleasures like walking, cooking and showering. However, many patients can't access in-center rehab, because they don't have transportation, or because the clinic is just too far away.Kivo Health solves this access problem by providing care to patients from the comfort of their home.
[Call today: 707-512-9401](https://kivohealth.com/<tel:+17075129401>)[Get in touch](https://kivohealth.com/<#contact-us-block>)
## Interested in learning more?
Send us a note and we’ll get back to you within 1 business day. Email us directly at hello@kivohealth.com or call today at [707-512-9401](https://kivohealth.com/<tel:707-512-9401>).

generated_description:
**Kivo Health: Revolutionizing Lung Rehabilitation Through Telehealth**

Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch, Kivo Health is a San Francisco-based startup that focuses on delivering telehealth pulmonary rehabilitation to patients with chronic lung diseases, such as COPD. Their mission is straightforward—provide effective, remote rehabilitation that allows patients to breathe easier, recover at home, and live their daily lives more fully.

### The Program
Kivo Health offers an innovative, 9-week pulmonary rehabilitation program. This program is designed to be accessible and convenient, allowing patients to engage in rehabilitation sessions with a live therapist via video conferencing. The service stands out for saving health insurers approximately $6,000 per patient while simultaneously combatting an alarming statistic: only 3% of eligible patients currently access this life-saving therapy.

### How It Works
Kivo's approach combines education, support, and practical exercises tailored to individual needs:

1. **Kivo Kit**: Upon enrollment, patients receive a kit with all the necessary equipment for their rehab exercises.
2. **Support**: A friendly staff member assists with setting up the equipment and addressing any questions.
3. **Live Sessions**: Patients join virtual sessions led by respiratory therapists, focusing on techniques to manage their condition and improve their quality of life.

### Impactful Results
Patients have reported impressive outcomes, such as a 45% increase in activity levels and significant improvements in functional capacity, quality of life, and mood. For many, remote access to rehab programs has been a game changer, particularly for those living far from traditional rehab facilities.

### Coverage & Accessibility
Kivo Health is covered by Medicare and most health insurance plans, which means financial barriers are minimal for patients. If co-pay issues arise, Kivo is proactive in working out payment plans that ensure individuals can participate in their life-changing program.

### Why It Matters
Kivo Health addresses a critical gap in healthcare by making pulmonary rehabilitation accessible to those who previously couldn't reach in-person services. With their telehealth model, they not only ease the burden on healthcare systems but also empower patients to reclaim their lives, literally helping them breathe easier every day. 

With a small yet passionate team of five and a commitment to their mission, Kivo Health is on the forefront of changing the landscape of healthcare, reminding us how technology can bridge significant gaps in access and recovery. If you're curious to learn more or need assistance, you can reach them at [kivohealth.com](https://kivohealth.com) or by calling them directly at (707) 512-9401.
